ComicInfo.Title: Epilogue
ComicInfo.Summary: Two short stories: an Epilogue to the first series featuring Urgrayne the Witch-Queen and the head of Bran, and a Prologue to the second series in which Artesia and her captains confront the campaign ahead. Also includes the Artesia Grammata letters column and a special gatefold centerfold with background info on some of Artesia's chief captains.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-15 13:36:22. [CVDB93773]
ComicInfo.Characters: Alexus, Artesia, Aspara, Becir, Bela, Borna, Branimir, Demetrius, Demidice, Erce, Ferris, Gavagh, Gawin, Gerovic, Golamir, Harcas, Hethis, Hueylin, Hymachus, Isola, Korovic, Lysia, Malcolm, Malgav, Malir, Mercer, Miklos, Moromir, Nema, Pavel, Radomir, Renham, Rogero, Sava, Sura, Sylus, Timir, Umasza, Urgrayne, Ustin, Vaslav, Yerwin
